title: Gazebo never starts when loading models from database takes longer than 30 secs

content.raw:
I deleted my gazebo models and wanted to retrieve current versions by just letting it pull them automatically upon launch. I have a pretty slow internet connection atm, so download (would) take a few minutes. Never get there though, as after 30 secs this happens:


```
#!

process[multisense_sl_robot_state_publisher-9]: started with pid [27765]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
process[tf2_buffer_server-10]: started with pid [27819]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
process[multisense_sl/camera/stereo_proc-11]: started with pid [27880]
Error [ConnectionManager.cc:116] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.
Warning [gazebo_main.cc:57] escalating to SIGKILL on server
[gazebo-1] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/kohlbrecher/.ros/log/54062cc4-d05a-11e2-88a7-6805ca10373a/gazebo-1*.log


```
content.html:
I deleted my gazebo models and wanted to retrieve current versions by just letting it pull them automatically upon launch. I have a pretty slow internet connection atm, so download (would) take a few minutes. Never get there though, as after 30 secs this happens:

process[multisense_sl_robot_state_publisher-9]: started with pid [27765]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
process[tf2_buffer_server-10]: started with pid [27819]
Exception AttributeError: AttributeError("'_DummyThread' object has no attribute '_Thread__block'",) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
process[multisense_sl/camera/stereo_proc-11]: started with pid [27880]
Error [ConnectionManager.cc:116] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.
Warning [gazebo_main.cc:57] escalating to SIGKILL on server
[gazebo-1] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/kohlbrecher/.ros/log/54062cc4-d05a-11e2-88a7-6805ca10373a/gazebo-1*.log
